rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established
rules.example: Are you a new or established patient with us?

rules.title: Identify Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: Patient confirms they have dental insurance and provides the name
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type (PPO/HMO)
rules.example: Is your plan a PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Suggest Insurance Type Identification Resources
rules.condition: Customer is unsure about their insurance type (PPO/HMO)
rules.action: Suggest checking their insurance card or the provider's website
rules.example: You can usually find that information on your insurance card or by checking your provider's website.

rules.title: Guide Insurance Card Type Location
rules.condition: Customer expresses difficulty finding their insurance plan type (PPO/HMO) on their card after being advised to check it.
rules.action: Instruct the customer on specific locations and keywords to look for on their insurance card to identify the plan type.
rules.example: On your insurance card, look for terms like 'PPO' or 'HMO' near the plan name, often on the front or back.

rules.title: Offer Insurance Identification Assistance
rules.condition: Customer is unsure about insurance type (HMO/PPO) or office assignment
rules.action: Offer to help identify the insurance type or assignment
rules.example: I can help you figure that out if you'd like.

rules.title: Gather Assignment Information for Insurance ID
rules.condition: Customer accepts assistance for insurance type/assignment identification
rules.action: Ask if they are assigned to a specific office or can choose any provider
rules.example: Are you assigned to a specific office, or can you choose any provider?

rules.title: Verify Patient Insurance
rules.condition: After the patient confirms they can choose any provider, or when insurance details are ready for verification.
rules.action: Access the appropriate system or website to verify the patient's insurance information.
rules.example: Understood. I will now proceed to verify your insurance details on our system.

rules.title: Acknowledge Customer Responses
rules.example: Okay, got it. Thank you for that information.
